text: Cool Hand Luke is a 1967 American prison drama movie directed by Stuart Rosenberg. It stars Paul Newman and George Kennedy, who won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for the role. Newman stars as Luke, a prisoner in a Florida prison camp who refuses to work by rules and the system. ==References== Category:1967 crime drama movies Category:American crime movies Category:American drama movies Category:Movies directed by Stuart Rosenberg Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Movies about veterans Category:Movies set in prison Category:Movies set in Florida Category:Movies set in the 1950s
title: Cool Hand Luke
